name: Muffin the Puffin and the temple of the golden herring
name_original: Muffin the Puffin and the temple of the golden herring
description:
Muffin the Puffin and the temple of the golden herring is a game developed by WonderPotato. It came out on 19-01-2020.
You can play Muffin the Puffin and the temple of the golden herring on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
